1101

1000 + 0011 =
1011
11

1011 + 0010 =
1101

D
1110 - 1010 =
0100

4.0

1010
10

1001 - 0110 = 
0011
3
3.0
1010 x 11 = 
11110

1E

0110

6.0
(Answer in 8-bit) 0111 + 1001 =
00010000

1110

00100111
